effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.x-y: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.x-y: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
